column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Came here on a Friday morning around 7:45a and the wait was still 40 mins. The food came out quickly which caused the quality to be compromised. The hash browns
column2: onions and broccoli in my skillet were all undercooked. Pretty disappointing. On a positive note
column3: the portions were decent Â and the pancakes were good.
